Others: Bradley Beal received no indication that he was going to be benched for the first time in nine years.
Beal scored 25 points off the bench, including 20 in the second half, to help the Suns end a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 win over the Sixers.
Head coach Mike Budenholzer said the decision to bench Beal and Jusuf NurkiÄ‡ was made because the Suns 'needed to make a change' after a four-game losing streak.
